thread.title: Marilyn
thread.title_full: Only Kosher Candy reviewed by Marilyn

author: Marilyn
title: Marilyn
text: I am a 4th grade teacher, and needed some "lozenges" to integrate with a literature unit I do with my class. Working at an Orthodox Jewish Day School, I looked for Kosher Mentos, but they were hard to find in my area. I was so pleased to be able to purchase these from Only Kosher Candy. Thank you.
